name: LiTYARD
0:
”Alexa, turn on the lights.”
”Alexa, set the lights to blue.”
”Alexa, set the lights to fifty percent.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Spa Electrics is proud to launch LiT Yard, the smart outdoor lighting system. 

From the comfort of your couch, or anywhere in the world, you are now able to control your Spa Electrics pool & Spa lights with colours that will be the envy of all your neighbours. 

Using the Alexa Skill, you can now integrate your Spa Electrics swimming pool and outdoor lighting with other smart lighting products. Just ask Alexa to turn your lights on or off, change colour and adjust brightness. 

You can also Integrate your outdoor lights with your daily events using routines. Select special colours or scenes for different events or actions, like arriving home. 
Start By saying

"Alexa, turn on the lights."
"Alexa, set the lights to blue."
"Alexa, set the lights to fifty percent."

Please note that users must own a Lit YARD 4 controller and have the Spa Electrics Multi Plus V2 Lights in order to use this skill.
